name: Ultimate Burger
description: Ah, burgers, one of the best reasons to look forward to summer! Discover the joy of homemade burgers and sink your teeth into this classic, juicy patty. With robust flavours of onion and garlic and a mild kick from some cayenne, we know you’ll agree that this burger is, indeed, ultimate! Round out your toppings with any of Epicure’s Sauces & Condiments.

ingredients.name: Burger Seasoning or Beef & Steak Seasoning
CCB Dip Mix or Cheesy Fries Seasoning
Buffalo Seasoning or Chipotle Aioli Mix

preparation:
1. Whisk together egg (if using), mustard, ketchup, seasonings, and dip mix. Mix in beef. Wet hands to prevent sticking and form mixture into 6 patties.
  2. Grill on the barbecue over medium-high heat with the lid closed for 5 minutes. Flip patties and continue grilling for an additional 5 minutes.
  3. Split and toast buns, if desired. Tuck burgers into buns with additional toppings, if desired.
tips: Mix 1⁄4 cup Crispy & Crunchy Coating Mix or dry breadcrumbs into ground beef mixture for a more tender texture to your burgers.
